name: DraGGoning
description:
This game was created for GMTK 2020 game jam with the theme of "Out of control".

So in this game you should drag an unchained dragon through the valley,
by pressing "A" or "D" keys you will try to steer the dragon in left or right directions,
if the dragon sees anything in proximity, that is exciting to burn (like sheep), it will try to get close to that by changing directions.
by pressing "SPACE" you'll make the dragon shoot a ball of fire,
be aware that our dragon would shoot in a repetitive manner (indicated by timer on the upper-left corner of the screen) but you can trigger the process manually.
in order to achieve more noble points, it's better not to ruin the lives of our peasants,
also stay away from tall trees and it's a rather good opportunity to incinerate enemy troops (if the game had any).
